document_data.name: Mulhorandan Lion-Wine
document_data.mainbody: '''Mulhorandan lion-wine''' was a type of [[wine]] that was exported from the country of [[Mulhorand]]. Select vintages were considered to be of exceptional taste by wine connoisseurs.
document_data.Trivia: [[Chess|Lord Chess]] of [[Zhentil Keep]] was known to appreciate the taste of lion-wine around the {{YearlinkName|1334}}.
